CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Billed"), 0,( MRC__c / CASE( MONTH( Estimated_Billed_Date__c ), 9, 30, 4, 30, 6, 30, 11, 30, 2, IF(MOD(YEAR(CloseDate), 400) = 0 || (MOD(YEAR(CloseDate), 4) = 0 && MOD(YEAR(CloseDate), 100) <> 0), 29, 28), 31 ) ) * ( CASE( MONTH( Estimated_Billed_Date__c ), 9, 30, 4, 30, 6, 30, 11, 30, 2, IF(MOD(YEAR(CloseDate), 400) = 0 || (MOD(YEAR(CloseDate), 4) = 0 && MOD(YEAR(CloseDate), 100) <> 0), 29, 28), 31 )- DAY( Estimated_Billed_Date__c ) +1 ))
CustomField.label: zDeprecated - ProRata MRC (Est)
